channel.title: St Flash Day. (Quest)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "St Flash Day. (Quest)"

item.title: Re: St Flash Day. (Quest)
item.content:encoded:
Hanging Out is primarily a function of Friend Points. Each day, the 10 people with the highest number of Friend Points for any given Ally will be selected to be 'Hanging Out' with that particular ally.

In addition to being a requirement for many Quests, it also gives the benefit of allowing you to learn that Ally's jutsu for 50% off.

You can check these Hang Outs by scrolling down to the bottom of your Main Page and clicking 'Top Ally Friend Points'

item.title: St Flash Day. (Quest)
item.content:encoded:
What does it mean to "hang out with Bruce Jr"
I have him in a 1 man team, what more does it want T_T
